ygData.subject: Re: [gladiator] If Doom was like Gladiator, . .
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm. . . doom w/ an overhead 2d view and gladiator like controls. . . novel.  I wonder if it would be any fun.

novel.  I wonder if it would be any fun.

alternate_dph wrote:
> 
> 
> Here's a new topic: if doom was like gladiator, . .
> 
> If doom was like gladiator, those monsters would eventually stop
> attacking you with long range attacks long enough to let their mana
> recharge.
> 
> If doom was like gladiator, you couldn't use the best weapons until
> you had a bunch of experience points.
>
